original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye

original: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū navakammaṁ karontā pathaviṁ khaṇantipi khaṇāpentipi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū nava kammam karontā pathavim khaṇanti pi khaṇāpenti pi

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā pathaviṁ khaṇissantipi khaṇāpessantipi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā pathavim khaṇissanti pi khaṇāpessanti pi
eka indriyam samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ jīvam viheṭhenti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āḷavakā bhikkhū pathaviṁ khaṇissantipi khaṇāpessantipī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū pathavim khaṇissanti pi khaṇāpessanti pi iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, pathaviṁ khaṇathapi khaṇāpethapī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave pathavim khaṇathapi khaṇāpethapi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, pathaviṁ khaṇissathapi khaṇāpessathapi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ pathavim khaṇissatha pi khaṇāpessatha pi
jīva saññinaḥ hi moghapurisā manussā pathaviyā
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṁ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu pathavim khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: dve pathaviyo— jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī.
analyzed: dve pathaviyaḥ jātā ca pathavī a jātā ca pathavī

original: suddhapaṁsu suddhamattikā appapāsāṇā appasakkharā appakaṭhalā appamarumbā appavālikā, yebhuyyenapaṁsukā, yebhuyyenamattikā.
analyzed: suddha pasu suddha mattikā appa pāsāṇāḥ appa sakkharāḥ appa kaṭhalāḥ appa marumbāḥ appa vālikāḥ yebhuyyena pasukāḥ yebhuyyena mattikā
a daḍḍhā api vuccati jātā pathavī

original: Yopi paṁsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā atirekacātumāsaṁ ovaṭṭho, ayampi vuccati jātā pathavī.
analyzed: yaḥ api pasu puñjaḥ vā mattikā puñjaḥ vā atireka cātumāsam ayam pi vuccati jātā pathavī

original: suddhapāsāṇā suddhasakkharā suddhakaṭhalā suddhamarumbā suddhavālikā appapaṁsukā
analyzed: suddha pāsāṇā suddha sakkharā suddha kaṭhalā suddha marumbā suddha vālikā appapasukā

original: appamattikā, yebhuyyenapāsāṇā, yebhuyyenasakkharā, yebhuyyenakaṭhalā, yebhuyyenamarumbā, yebhuyyenavālikā.
analyzed: appamattikāḥ yebhuyyena pāsāṇāḥ yebhuyyena sakkharāḥ yebhuyyena kaṭhalāḥ yebhuyyena marumbāḥ yebhuyyena vālikā

original: Yopi paṁsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā omakacātumāsaṁ ovaṭṭho, ayampi vuccati ajātā pathavī.
analyzed: yaḥ api pasu puñjaḥ vā mattikā puñjaḥ vā ayam pi vuccati a jātā pathavī

original: Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sakim āṇattaḥ bahukam pi āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Pathaviyā pathavisaññī khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, dahati vā dahāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: pathaviyā pathavi saññī khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā dahati vā dahāpeti vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Pathaviyā vematiko khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, dahati vā dahāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: pathaviyā vematikaḥ khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā dahati vā dahāpeti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Pathaviyā apathavisaññī khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, dahati vā dahāpeti vā, anāpatti.
analyzed: pathaviyā a pathavī saññī khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā dahati vā dahāpeti vā anāpatti
a pathaviyā pathavi saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
a pathaviyā a pathavi saññī anāpatti

original: “imaṁ jāna, imaṁ dehi, imaṁ āhara, iminā attho, imaṁ kappiyaṁ karohī”ti bhaṇati,
analyzed: imam jāna imam dehi imam āhara iminā imam kappiyam karohi iti bhaṇati
